settings.subtitle: FAQ Corner
settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.question_1: How can I place an order?
settings.answer_1: Simply browse our collection, add your favorite artwork to the cart, and complete checkout securely.
settings.answer_2: Orders are usually processed within 1–2 business days and delivered within 5–8 business days depending on your location.
settings.answer_3: Availability of COD depends on your location and order value.
settings.answer_4: Yes, once your order is shipped, tracking details will be shared via email or SMS.
settings.question_5: Are the artworks exactly the same as shown?
settings.answer_5: Yes, we ensure accurate product representation. Slight color variations may occur due to screen settings.
settings.answer_6: You can reach us anytime via our Contact Us page or email.
settings.footer_text: Still have questions? We're happy to help!
